entry.title: Shampoo | Forest Mint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type:
Price: 85.00 - 1682.00 (9 variants)

Most shampoos contain powerful cleaning agents that can strip your client's hair and scalp of its natural oils. Repair your client's hair and scalp with our essential oil infused men's shampoo. Our shampoo is made using only the best ingredients like real eucalyptus, tea tree and peppermint essential oil and contains no artificial fragrance. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free. MSRP: $16.99.

Key Features: Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint Oil & Tea Tree Oil. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free.

OVERVIEW

Repair Your Client's Scalp

Eucalyptus, Peppermint & Tea Tree essential oil contain properties to promote healthy hair and scalp health.

Contains Essential Oils With No Added Fragrance To Clean & Protect Your Client's Hair

Whether your client's hair is curly, thinning, or greying, a dry itchy scalp can lead to dandruff, flaking and damaged hair. Our shampoo is Paraben, DEA & Sodium Lauryl Sulfate free so it won't dry out your customer's hair and scalp. We use real essential oils, like Peppermint, Eucalyptus, and Tea Tree Oil to achieve our signature scent. 

Works on All Hair & Scalp Types

Whether your client's hair is long or short our shampoo penetrates to the roots to help promote healthier and better looking hair.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality

We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our shampoo in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean your customers receive quality shampoo that contains only the freshest ingredients.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut. At wash station, rinse clients' hair and create a gentle lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Pair with Rocky Mountain Barber Company's Hair Conditioner for best results. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: Dispense into hair then massage and rinse. Pair with Rocky Mountain Barber Company's Hair Conditioner for the ultimate Hair Care Routine. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 13.5 cm x 5.8 cm x 5.8 cm
    • Volume: 237 ml
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Ammonium Lauryl Sulphate, Ammonium Laureth Sulphate, Cocomidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Polyquaternium 7, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium chloride, Menthol, Cannabis Sativa (hemp seed) oil, Mentha Piperita ( Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Citric Acid.

entry.title: Conditioner | Forest Mint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type:
Price: 85.00 - 1682.00 (9 variants)

A great hair conditioner softens your clients' hair and further hydrates and protects it after shampooing. Repair your client's hair and scalp with our essential oil infused men's daily use conditioner. Our conditioner is made using only the best ingredients like real eucalyptus, tea tree and peppermint essential oil and contains no artificial fragrance. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free. MSRP: $16.99.

Key Features: Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint Oil & Tea Tree Oil. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free.

OVERVIEW

Repair Your Client's Scalp

Eucalyptus, Peppermint & Tea Tree essential oil contain properties to promote healthy hair and scalp health.

Contains Essential Oils With No Added Fragrance To Hydrate & Protect Your Client's Hair

Whether your client's hair is curly, thin, oily, fine, or greying, an unhealthy scalp can lead to dandruff, flaking and damaged hair. Our conditioner is Paraben, DEA & Sodium Lauryl Sulfate free so it won't dry out your client's hair and scalp.

Works on All Hair & Scalp Types

Whether your client's hair is long or short, curly or straight, our conditioner penetrates to the roots to help promote healthier and better looking hair.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality

We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our conditioner in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean your customers receive a conditioner that contains only the freshest ingredients.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut. At wash station, apply to client's hair after shampooing to damp hair. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after 3 minutes. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: Apply after shampooing to damp hair. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after 3 minutes. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 18.5 cm x 4.6 cm x 4.6 cm
    • Volume: 237 ml
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyquaternium 7, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone (and) Trideceth-12 (and) Cetrimonium Chloride, Steryl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Menthol, Cannabis Sativa (hemp seed) oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.

entry.title: Hair Texture Paste
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type: Styling Product
Price: 91.30 - 1808.00 (9 variants)

Your clients know how important a flexible lifestyle is. A great texture paste provides a great hold while still maintaining a high level of flexibility to style and rework one's hair throughout the day. Whether your clients' hair is short, long, curly, thick or thinning, our texture paste gives them the style and confidence it takes to pull off virtually any modern hairstyle. MSRP: $17.99.

Features: Beeswax. 

OVERVIEW

A Familiar Hold without the Clumping or Flaking

Most guys are familiar with gels, which means they're also familiar with the clumpy feeling and flaking that they produce as well. Our texture paste, works just like hair gels and hair creams, but its plant and vegetable derived formula makes it easier to get the hair style your clients want without clumping and flaking.

Natural Ingredients Means a Natural Style

A natural style means being confident about how you look and feel. Our texture paste includes natural and plant derived ingredients your clients can feel good about. Featuring five natural ingredients - including Beeswax, Lanolin, & Glycerin - our texture paste helps maintain a healthy hold that won't damage your customer's hair.

Small Batch Production

In the earliest years of manufacturing, a craftsman skillfully created goods one by one to ensure the highest level of quality. We wanted to take the same approach when designing our texture paste. Each and every product is created in-house from start to finish and inspected to ensure it meets the quality your clients expect from Rocky Mountain Barber Company.

A Subtle Natural Scent

Our use of natural ingredients means your customers get a texture paste that features a light, natural scent that won't come off as overpowering. Its light scent gives clients' cologne or aftershave the breathing room needed to be their feature scent.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut, while it's slightly damp. Begin by using your fingertip to scoop a dime-sized amount into the palm of your other hand. Add a splash of warm water, then rub your hands together vigorously for 10 seconds to smooth the paste. Once paste is smooth, apply and work into clients' hair until fully absorbed. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: For best results, apply to slightly damp hair. Begin by using your fingertip to scoop a dime-sized amount into the palm of your other hand. Add a splash of warm water, then rub your hands together vigorously for 10 seconds to smooth the paste. Once paste is smooth, apply and work into hair until fully absorbed. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 6.2 cm x 6.2 cm x 2.4 cm
    • Weight: 56 grams
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Lanolin Alcohol, Beeswax, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Ozokerite, PVP, Glycerin, PEG 40 Castor Oil, Glyceral Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance

entry.title: Hair Pomade | 5 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type: Styling Product
Price: 111.40 - 2206.00 (9 variants)

Your clients will never look as good as the moment they leave the barbershop. There's nothing worse than getting a great haircut, only to have difficulty recreating the same look day in and day out afterword. With high-shine, a firm hold, and a natural scent, our water-based Pomade will give your clients barber-grade performance at home. MSRP: $21.99.

﻿Features: Beeswax.

OVERVIEW

No Grease, Washes Out Easy

No grease stains here. Oil-based pomades can be a nightmare to wash out and can damage hair by stripping them of their natural oils, and leave your clients' forehead and scalp prone to breakouts. Our premium water-based pomade can be washed out easily, won't damage hair and won't clog pores. 

20% More Pomade, 100% More Style

Sometimes bigger is better. To give your clients maximum style flexibility, we knew we had to provide maximum size to experiment, refine and perfect their look - that's why we set out to create one of the largest sized pomades on the market.

Hold Hair in Place, Not Noses Hostage

We designed this pomade to have a light natural scent, that won't come off as overpowering. So whether it's the scent of your clients' cologne, body wash or beard balm they want as their anchor scent, this pomade won't get in the way.

Crafted in Small Batches

Proudly created in small-batches for the ultimate craft hairstyling experience. Each step of the production process is completed in house to ensure highest quality standards throughout the process. Smaller batches mean a fresh pomade for an even fresher style.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut, while it's slightly damp. Begin by using your fingertip to scoop a dime-sized amount into the palm of your other hand. Add a splash of warm water, then rub your hands together vigorously for 10 seconds to smooth the pomade. Once pomade is smooth, apply and work into clients' hair until fully absorbed. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: For best results, apply to slightly damp hair. Begin by using your fingertip to scoop a dime-sized amount into the palm of your other hand. Add a splash of warm water, then rub your hands together vigorously for 10 seconds to smooth the pomade. Once pomade is smooth, apply and work into hair until fully absorbed. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 8.0 cm x 8.0 cm x 3.5 cm
    • Volume: 141 grams
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Ceteareth 25, Beeswax, Glycerin, PEG 40, Propylene Glycol, Polysorbate, PVP K30, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.
